original_text: For verily I say unto you, That whosoever shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass; he shall have whatsoever he saith.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 누구든지 이 산더러 들리어 바다에 던져지라 하며 그 말하는 것이 이루어질 줄 믿고 마음에 의심하지 아니하면 그대로 되리라

sentences.original_text: For verily I say unto you,
That whosoever shall say unto this mountain,
and be thou cast into the sea;
and shall not doubt in his heart,
but shall believe that those things which he saith
he shall have whatsoever he saith.
